SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[CoreUrlRedirect] ( [CoreUrlRedirect_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [CoreEntities_Code] varchar(200) NULL , [CoreEntities_KeyValue] varchar(200) NULL , [CoreUrlRedirect_UrlSource] varchar(MAX) NULL , [CoreUrlRedirect_UrlDestination] varchar(MAX) NULL , [CoreUrlRedirect_UserInsert] int NULL , [CoreUrlRedirect_UserUpdate] int NULL , [CoreUrlRedirect_UserDelete] int NULL , [CoreUrlRedirect_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [CoreUrlRedirect_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [CoreUrlRedirect_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[CoreUrlRedirect] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CoreUrlRedirect PRIMARY KEY ([CoreUrlRedirect_Ky])
